page.title: 07TRAFFIC SURVEY ON A433
page.content: {MONDAY JULY 15th 1985 A433 ROAD} Our survey began at 8.30a.m. and finished at 3.00p.m.The road was much busier than we thought. 2058 vehicles passed the school during the day. 70% were cars and 26% were vans and lorries. During the day, 54% of the traffic (1103 vehicles) was going towards Worcester.The road was at its busiest from 8.30 to 9.00a.m. when 262 vehicles passed the school, 65% heading towards Worcester.The complete list of figures appears on page 8. {N.B.}The first entry is for the {half {hour}from 8.30a.m. to 9.00a.m. The remaining entries are for{each {hour. The entry {"OTHERS"}includes motor cycles ,bicycles, buses, coaches and tractors.
